articles.title: High school’s AI security system confuses Doritos bag for a possible firearm
articles.summary: A high school student in Baltimore County, Maryland was reportedly handcuffed and searched after an AI security system flagged his bag of chips as a possible firearm.

articles.title: OpenAI buys Sky, an AI interface for Mac
